definition: A fast-paced team sport played on ice, involving two teams of players who use sticks to hit a small object into the opposing team's goal. It is commonly played in countries with cold climates and is a popular professional sport.

examples.english: Ice hockey is a popular winter sport.

examples.german: Die deutsche Eishockeymannschaft hat das Spiel gewonnen.
examples.english: The German ice hockey team won the game.
Ice hockey requires skill and endurance.

examples.german: In Kanada ist Eishockey sehr popul√§r.
examples.english: Ice hockey is very popular in Canada.
